A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The biggest Problem with the movie is\, that it doesn't feel like a Star Wars Movie. It feels like a Marvel Movie in the Star Wars universe. Poorly written\, lazy story\, a lot of stuff that doesn't fit into the lore\, really unnecessary \"side-quests\" that prolong the film\, always looking for the cheap laugh. In all I'm very disappointed after such a promising \"The Force Awakens\". J.J. Abrams really has a been left with a mess for the last Episode... I wish him luck\, because I really liked his Star Wars Movie... The Last Jedi is so far the weakest of them all... (There are even figures that are more unnecessary than Jaja Binks...)
